title: Ep 219: Mental Health Professionals: Why So Liberal?
description: Surveys find that psychologists tend to align themselves with a liberal political orientation.  Why is that?  Are liberal-minded people drawn to human service professions or is there something about working in human services that causes people to become more liberal in their political views?  In this episode I propose a few ideas that I think explains why mental health professionals tend to be on the liberal side of the political spectrum.  I invite your constructive feedback on these suggestions.
